summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of West 61st Street, from 32nd Avenue Northwest to a point four hundred twenty-three (423) feet west thereof; all in The City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 6769 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
